name: Claudette HOUSTON and Louise Board, Respondents, v. SOUTHEASTERN PENNSYLVANIA TRANSPORTATION AUTHORITY, Petitioner

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of February, 2008, the Application for Relief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
